title: Assassin to Fighter
body:
LAZAR PETROVIC Yesterday at 19:55
I mean...some champions got tough nerfes(for a reason).One of them is khazix.He just lost role of an assassin,and has major lack of dmg compared to katarina,talon,rengar,zed...Just not a real assassin.I thought of an idea to make him fighter when doing next stuff. 
1.Remove heal from W ability.Make that u get 0.25 armor and magic resist whenever u kill large minion,monster in jungle,or champion. 
2.Q ability:when he deals damage with that spell he heals himself for the 3%+0.8 AP of opponents missing hp.If neccesary nerf Q damaage a little.

This would make kha alot more durable.Real FIGHTER
